body: The possible reason is the Overlapped I/O used in the implementation of `Pipe` in `multiprocessing`. It's the uninitialized overlapped structure that caused type 1 error.
body_html: The possible reason is the Overlapped I/O used in the implementation of Pipe in multiprocessing. It's the uninitialized overlapped structure that caused type 1 error.
body_text: The possible reason is the Overlapped I/O used in the implementation of Pipe in multiprocessing. It's the uninitialized overlapped structure that caused type 1 error.
